topic.title: Emergency Care Clinically Ready to Proceed Timestamp
topic.shortdesc: An Emergency Care Clinically Ready To Proceed Timestamp is the first date and time that the CARE PROFESSIONAL, authorised to discharge the PATIENT from the Emergency Care Department, makes a clinical decision that the PATIENT no longer requires ongoing care in the Emergency Care Department.
